class.name: pandora_vision_hole/pandora_pc_thermal_synchronizer
class.description: Nodelet for handling and synchronizing pointcloud2 with thermal messages.

class.name: pandora_vision_hole/pandora_hole_fusion
class.description: Nodelet for validating holes from rgb,depth and thermal nodes.

class.name: pandora_vision_hole/pandora_thermal_cropper
class.description: Synchronizer nodelet that fuses RGBDT info and ROIs from thermal to produce input for victim node.
